entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Fog patches. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight then becoming light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 12:05 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 12:05 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 12:05 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
